TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SelectedDatesCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class SelectedDatesCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class SelectedDatesCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type SelectedDatesCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封裝表示在 控制項中所選取日期的 物件集合。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個類別來以程式設計方式管理集合物件表示中的選取的日期控制項。Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the selected dates in a control. 這個類別常用來新增或移除集合中的日期。This class is commonly used to add or remove dates from the collection. 這個集合會儲存完整的日期。This collection stores only whole dates. 時間部分，每個已移除。The time portion of each is removed. 儲存日期，以遞增順序。The dates are stored in ascending order. 如果有重複的日期，只有一個日期儲存在集合中。If there are duplicate dates, only one date is stored in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用類別，以選取日期控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically use the class to select dates in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立-實作的物件，可以輕鬆地逐一查看透過取得每個項目中集合。Use this method to create an -implemented object that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the collection. 使用屬性取得目前的項目指向集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法，以移至下一步 的項目集合中。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法，將列舉值移回到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator back to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 方法需要在建立之後呼叫-實作物件，或使用方法，將列舉程式移至集合中第一個項目。The method needs to be called after creating an -implemented object or using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法用來建立-實作的物件，以顯示所選取的日期，從逐一控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an -implemented object that is iterated through to display the selected dates from the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic SelectedDatesCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
